topic.title: ACTIVITY RESOURCE IDENTIFIER (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING)
topic.shortdesc: A unique identifier to report ACTIVITY PROPERTY components such as staffing, supplies, systems and facilities, used to deliver care activities to a PATIENT, for the purposes of reporting Patient Level Information Costing.
